short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Domain search from your toolbar; gives recommendations, recent searches, similar options, country/region, and premium domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for domain names right from your toolbar. You can search with a TLD for targeted results. Or just type a domain name and the extension will return your results. Adding a domain name choice will return a full range of possible domains. If available Planteen Host will return results for .net, .info, and .org. These are commonly bought together with .com to secure your domain name choice across the spectrum of TLDs. 

In addition to the results, Planteen Host will recommend domain names for you giving you a range of options. Recommended domain names will often include other TLDs, ccTLDs, or gTLDs of the same domain search. Similar options will give you several permutation of your original search. Here you can expand on your original idea and use creativity to hone in your concept. Country/Region will return your original search term with ccTLDs. For example, .se, .com.br, .com.co and .fr. Here you can explore the possibilities for branding in specific countries and regions. Premium domain names will attract more visitors with a variation of your domain name concept that are already on the market and pulling in thousands of visitors.     

There are four things to remember:

- Protect your name with matching domains.

- Expand your presence with similar domain names.

- Connect with customers in a specific country.

- Attract more visitors with popular Premium domains.
